GSP29udnyku4u:6: na ca nityasya sarvaviṣasyacānadhigatārthatā, vyāghātāt- atrocyate-
GSP29udnyku4u:11: na cotpadyamānāpi pramāturanapekṣiteti na pramā, prāmāṇyasyātadadhīnatvāt
GSP29udnyku4u:13: tadanapekṣatvena tu tasya pramāṇye taduttarasyāpi tathaiva syāt, aviśeṣāt
GSP29udnyku4u:16: [ku.4.503] tat phalaṃ pramaiva na bhavati gṛhītamātragocaratvāt
GSP29udnyku4u:25: svarūpeṇa tajjanane 'nāgatādiviśiṣṭatānubhavavirodhāt; tajjñānena tu tajjanane sūryagatyādīnāmajñāne tadviśiṣṭatānutpādāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:33: gṛhītavismṛtārthaśrutau kā vārtā? apramaivāsāviti cet- gatamidānīṃ vedaprāmāṇyapratyāśayā
GSP29udnyku4u:42: nanu smṛtiḥ pramaiva kiṃ na syāt yathārthajñānatvāt pratyakṣādyanubhūtivaditi cenna, siddhe vyavahāre nimittānusaraṇāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:43: na ca svecchākalpitena nimittena lokavyavahāraniyamanam; avyavasthayā lokavyavahāraviplavaprasaṅgāt
GSP29udnyku4u:49: [ku.4.508] evaṃ vyavasthite tarkyate 'pi yat- iyamanubhavaikaviṣayā satī tanmukhanirīkṣaṇena tadyathārthatvāyathārthatve anuvidhīyamānā
GSP29udnyku4u:51: iti vyavahāre 'pi pūrvānubhava eva pramitiḥ, anapekṣatvāt; na tu smṛtiḥ,
GSP29udnyku4u:61: [ku.4.509] yadi hi (yadi tarhi) smṛtirna pramitiḥ, pūrvānubhave kiṃ pramāṇam? smṛtyanyathānupapattiriti cenna- tayā kāraṇamātrasiddheḥ /
GSP29udnyku4u:63: ananubhūtepi tarhi smaraṇaṃ syāditi cet- kiṃ na syāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:67: tathābhūtaṃ jñānameva vā tatsiddhiḥ? ādye tadvadevānaikāntikatvam /
GSP29udnyku4u:68: na hi yadākāraṃ jñānam, tatpūrvakatvaṃ tasyeti niyamaḥ; anāgatajñāne vibhrame ca vyabhicārāt
GSP29udnyku4u:70: mā bhūt pūrvānubhavasiddhiḥ; kiṃ naśchinnamiti cet- na tarhi smṛtyanubhavayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhiriti
GSP29udnyku4u:74: na ca tadeva jñānaṃ kālabhedenāpramāṇam; anapekṣatvasyāparāvṛtteḥ /
GSP29udnyku4u:76: [ku.4.511] syādetat- anupakārakaṃ (216) viṣayasya tadīyametadīyaṃ vā na
GSP29udnyku4u:78: na ca tasyetyaniyataṃ tatra pramāṇam, atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:87: na hi tatra jñānena kiñcit kriyate iti śakyamavagantum; asatvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:88: na ca taddharmasāmānyādhāraṃ kiñcit kriyate iti yuktam; tena tasyaiva viṣayatvaprāpteḥ
GSP29udnyku4u:89: tādātmyādviśeṣasyāpi saiva jñātateti cet, tat kiṃ cakṣuṣā ghaṭe jñāyamāne raso 'pi jñāyate, tādātmyāt? ghaṭākāreṇa jñāyata evāsau (rasaḥ) iti cet-
GSP29udnyku4u:90: atha rasākāreṇa kiṃ na jñāyate? tena rūpeṇa jñātatānādhāratvāditi cet- na tarhi vartamānasāmānyajñāne 'pyatītānāgatādijñānam; tenākāreṇa prākaṭyānādhāratvāditi /
GSP29udnyku4u:92: na;- (anaikāntyā) anekāntādasiddhervā na ca liṅgamiha kriyā /
GSP29udnyku4u:95: na hi śarasaṃyogena gagane kiñcit kriyate; antyaśabdābhivyaktyā (217) vā
GSP29udnyku4u:99: na hi taiḥ prameye kiñcit kriyate; api tu pramātaryeva /
GSP29udnyku4u:108: tathā hi jñāto 'yamartha iti sāmānyataḥ, sākṣātkṛto 'yamartha iti viśeṣato viṣayaviśeṣaṇameva kiñcit parisphuratīti cet /
GSP29udnyku4u:110: yathā hi- " arthenaiva viśeṣo hi nirākāratayādhiyām" /
GSP29udnyku4u:111: tathā- kriyayaiva viśeṣo hi vyavahāreṣu karmaṇām //4 //
GSP29udnyku4u:112: kiṃ na paśyasi, ghaṭakriyā paṭakriyetivat kṛto ghaṭaḥ kariṣyate ghaṭa
GSP29udnyku4u:114: tathaiva gṛhāṇa, ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭajñānamitivat jñāto ghaṭo jñāsyate jñāyate
GSP29udnyku4u:116: kathamasambaddhayordharmadharmibhāva iti cet- dhvasto ghaṭa iti yathā /
GSP29udnyku4u:117: etadapi kathamiti cet- nūnaṃ dhvaṃsenāpi ghaṭe kiñcit kriyate iti
GSP29udnyku4u:119: tannirūpaṇādhīnanirūpaṇo dhvaṃsaḥ svabhāvādeva tadīya iti kimatra sambandhāntareṇeti cet- prakṛte 'pyevameva /
GSP29udnyku4u:127: jñātatayā hi jñānamanumīyeta, jñāte ca tadvyavahārānyathānupapattistāṃ
GSP29udnyku4u:135: vyavahārānyathānupapattyaiva siddha āśraya iti cenna- jñānahetunaiva tadupapatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku4u:141: na hyetāvatā jñānaṃ taditi siddhyati, tasyaivāsiddheḥ /
GSP29udnyku4u:142: tathāpi niyatasya kartuḥ pravṛtteḥ kartṛdharmeṇaiva kenacit pravṛttihetunā bhavitavyamiti cet- astvicchā pratyakṣasiddhā; na tu jñānam /
GSP29udnyku4u:143: saiva kathaṃ niyatādhikaraṇe (ṇa) utpadyatāmiti cenna- jñānābhyupagame 'pi
GSP29udnyku4u:145: svahetoḥ kutaściditi cet- tata evecchāstu, kiṃ jñānakalpanayeti /
GSP29udnyku4u:146: syādetat- prakāśamāne khalvarthe tadupāditsādirupajāyate; na tu suṣuptyavasthāyāmaprakāśamāne 'pyarthe ityanubhavasiddham /
GSP29udnyku4u:147: tata icchāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ vilakṣaṇameva kiñcit parikalpanīyam, yasmin sati susvāpalakṣaṇamaudasīnyamarthaviṣayamātmano nivartate iti cet- hantaivaṃ susvāpanivṛttimanubhavaniddhāṃ pratijānānena jñānamevāparokṣyamiṣyante acetayanneva hi suṣupta ityucyate; acaitanyanivṛttireva hi caitanyaṃ
GSP29udnyku4u:151: apica kimidaṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ nāma? yadyāśutaravināśitvam, tadānaikāntikam /
GSP29udnyku4u:153: nanu sthāyi vijñānaṃ yādṛśamarthakṣaṇaṃ gṛhṇadutpadyate, dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe kiṃ tādṛśameva gṛṇhāti, anyādṛśaṃ vā, na vā kamapīti /
GSP29udnyku4u:154: na prathamaḥ, tasya kṣaṇasyātītatvāt; pratyakṣajñānasya ca vartamānābhavatvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:162: tathā ca jñānaṃ prathame yamarthamālambya jātam, dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe tadālambanameva tannaveti praśnārthaḥ /
GSP29udnyku4u:165: tathāpi jñeyanivṛttau kathaṃ jñānānuvṛttiḥ? tadanuvṛttau vā kathaṃ
GSP29udnyku4u:166: jñeyanivṛttiriti cet- kimasminnanupapannam? na hi jñānamarthaścetyekaṃ
GSP29udnyku4u:168: [ku.4.520] satyapi vā kṣaṇikatve kathamapratyakṣam? itthaṃ yathocyate-na
GSP29udnyku4u:170: na ca jñānāntaragrāhyam, jñānayaugapadyaniṣedhena samānakālasya tasyābhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:172: grāhyakāle ca grāhakasyānāgatatvāt- iti cet- nanvevaṃ jñātatāpi na
GSP29udnyku4u:179: kṣaṇikatvameva tasyāḥ kuta iti cet- tvaduktayuktereva /
GSP29udnyku4u:180: tathāhi- yaṃ kṣaṇamāśritya jātā tataḥ paramapi tamevāśrayante anyaṃ vā, na vā kamapīti /
GSP29udnyku4u:185: na cānyamapi kṣaṇaṃ jñānamavagāhate, tadānīṃ tasyāsattvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:188: [ku.4.521] atītenāpi tenaiva kṣaṇenopalakṣitānuvartate iti cet- evaṃ tarhi vartamānārthatā prakāśasya (223) na syāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:189: anyathā jñānasyāpi tathānuvṛtteḥ ko doṣaḥ? nahi vartamānārthaprakāśasambandhamantareṇa jñānasyānyā vartamānāvabhāsatā nāma /
GSP29udnyku4u:191: [ku.4.522] atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa iti sthūla eva vartamānaḥ prakāśenāśrīyate ityabhyupagamaḥ, tadā tajjñānasyāpi sa eva viṣaya iti
GSP29udnyku4u:193: [ku.4.523] nanu (4) jñānamaindriyakaṃ cet, viṣayasañcāro na syāt,sañjātasambandhatvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:194: na ca jijñāsāniyamānniyamaḥ, tasyāḥ saṃśayapūrvakatvāt, tasya ca dharmijñānapūrvakatvāt, dharmiṇaśca sannidhimātreṇa jñāne jijñāsāpekṣaṇe vā ubhayathāpyanavasthānāditi- tanna- jñātatāpakṣe 'pi tulyatvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:195: tasyā api hi jñeyatve tatparamparājñānāpātāt; jijñāsāniyamasya ca tadvadanupapatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku4u:197: svabhāvata eva kācidasāvajijñāsitāpi jñāyate, na tu sarveti cet- tulyam /
GSP29udnyku4u:198: prāgutpannajñātatāsmaraṇajanitajijñāsaḥ samunmīlitanayanaḥ sañjātajñānasamutpāditaprākaṭyaṃ jijñāsureva pratipadyate ityato nānavastheti cet- tulyametat /
GSP29udnyku4u:200: nirvikalpakapūrvakatvād; nirvikalpakagṛgītasya tāvatkālānavasthānāt; tasya tenaiva vināśāt
GSP29udnyku4u:204: prāggrahaṇādanumānādivattadupapatteḥ; prakṛte tu jñānatvāderanupalabdheragṛhītaviśeṣaṇāyāśca buddherviśeṣyānupasaṅkramātkathamevaṃ syāt? na; utpannamātrasyaiva bāhyaviṣayajñānasyālocanāt tatastatpuraḥsaraṃ prathamata eva tajjātīyasya jñānāntarasya vikalpanāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:215: iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ- tasmin sati tadbalādeva; asati tu tajjanitavāsanābalāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:217: na ca viṣayāṃśe tattathā syāditi yuktam- avacchedakatayā prāgavasthāvadavabhāsanāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:219: atha grahaṇasmaraṇayoḥ kiyatī sāmagrī? adhikor'thasannikarṣo grahaṇasya,
GSP29udnyku4u:223: atha kaḥsannikarṣaḥ? jñānena saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ, tadarthena saṃyuktasamavetaviśeṣaṇatvamiti
GSP29udnyku4u:228: [ku.4.526] athāpi jñānaṃ pratyakṣamityatra kiṃ pramāṇam? pratyakṣameva /
GSP29udnyku4u:233: ata eva ca na tadaśrayaḥ pramāteti- ucyate- mitiḥ samyak paricchittistadvattā ca pramātṛtā
GSP29udnyku4u:239: na tat pramākaraṇamiti tviṣyata eva,pramayā sambandhābhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:243: tena hīśvarasya prāmāṇyaṃ pratipādyate, na tu pramātṛtvamiti cet- na-
GSP29udnyku4u:245: pramāsamavāyo hi pramātṛvyavahāranimittam; pramayā tvayāyogavyavacchedena sambandhaḥ pramāṇavyavahāranimittam
GSP29udnyku4u:248: [ku.4.528] syādetat- pramīyate 'neneti pramāṇam, pramiṇotīti pramātā iti
GSP29udnyku4u:250: tathāca kathamakārakamartha iti cet- na- etasya vyutpattimātranimittatvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:252: anyathā asmadādiṣu na pramātṛvyavahāraḥ syāt; sarvatra svātantryābhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:256: na hi tat pratyakṣamanumānamāgamo vā, anindriyaliṅgaśabdakaraṇatvāt- na-
GSP29udnyku4u:267: na- yad yatra nāsti tatra tasyāvagatiriti bhrāntyarthatvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:269: nahi na tadrajatam, nāpi tatrāsat, nāpi tannāvagatamiti /
